titleInfo.title: Letter from Evelyn Baring, Private Secretary's Office, Government House, Simla to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Colonel John Cheape Brooke's recommendation that Captain Charles William Burton be confirmed to the post of assistant, and Government's concerns owing to his previous 'disparaging manner' and also a recent censure by Government which has lead Lord Northbrook (Viceroy of India) to deny the request and confirm Captain Hunter instead, and asking Pelly to judge his capabilities.
